author: HITESH BODHE
comment: Despite installation on sony zl it doesn't get installed on watch 3 even though it is connected to my cell. I have bought this app and now its of no use as unavailable on my watch. Please help or refund the money.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Have you managed to connect & sync any apps from your phone to your watch? Please make sure your watch is paired using the android wear application on your phone and sync apps. Once installed, you'll be able to select Wear Time Circuit as the watch face on your watch.

title: Cannot use on Sony Watch 3

author: Chris Nixon
comment: Fan-Tas-Tic!  Blown away. My favourite settings are: Electron speed a little faster than default, and both Circuit Intensity & Electron Intensity one notch dimmer than default, and the date dragged down to the bottom of the screen as in the photos (use the Custom Date Position for this).

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks Blitterbug! I'm glad to hear you like the watch face!

author: Peeda Bregga
comment: I was skeptical at first about it but after reading the reviews I gave it a chance! I love the customizable colors and circuit intensity... Only thing I would love to see on here is battery life for either the watch and/or phone... Other then that I love it!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Hi Peeda, Thanks for your feedback and suggestions!

title: Coolest circuit watch app out!

author: Travis Bilal
comment: Sucks alot of battery on moto 360.  30 minutes of being off the charger my battery went from 100% to 75%

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Please be sure to upgrade to Android  Wear 5.0.1 in order to take advantage of the drastically improved battery life offered by the latest version of Wear Time Circuit.

title: Fix battery life

author: Randy Bolton
comment: Everyone I've shown this watch face to thinks it's so cool. These unique and imaginative watch faces are what Android Wear is all about. Go suck on my electrons Apple Watch!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the awesome review :)

title: The Ultimate EE Watch Face!

author: Kevin Chance
comment: Elegant and simple. I would love to see different a regular digital font but that's just a suggestion. Also, an analog watch face with the animated circuit would be a really cool addition.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Hi Kevin, Thanks for the feedback and recommendations!

title: Really like it!

author: Gregory Schunemann
comment: I would REALLY love it if there was an option to show date on wake, but hide the date in standby.  Nice work!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback and suggestion!

title: Love the watch face, but...

author: Clarence Willey
comment: Watch face never showed up in my android wear watch face App or on my zen watch2

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content:
Hi Clarence, 

I'm both surprised and sorry to hear that you experienced installation issues.

Did you try following the instructions in my play store listing?

In particular, did you long-press the screen on your zen watch to see if the watch face was displayed in the gallery?

title: Getting refund

author: Joe LaPenna
comment: When in active mode, the contrast of the watch face makes it difficult to make out the actual time.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Hi Joe, the contrast is configurable. Just change the Circuit Intensity option in the Time Circuit application on the watch.

comment: Looks great but no customization on Sony smart watch 3... Found it. Didn't find it very clear though.
title: Looks good

author: Albertus Sulistiyo
comment: is it configurable on moto360 2nd gen? since no option found.. update: fixed, option found below settings icon after reboot

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Yes, open the application launcher on the watch and you will find an icon for Wear Time Circuit.

author: Steven Holzhauser
comment: I wanted a simple watch face that told me what day of the week it is...Finally my search is over.Thank you!
title: Date format

author: Koen Hendriks
comment: Looks amazing! Options to customize are awesome as well! Great watch face

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback!

title: Love it!

author: Joseph Allen
comment: Beautiful watch face. Runs smooth and isn't a battery drain. I just really wish it had a battery percentage option.

author: mal bisset
comment: Fantastic well worth the money,great features easy setup love it

author: Thomas Mooney
comment: Looks cool, but it needs weather information.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Thomas!

author: Chris Ram
comment: Best
title: Nice

author: Cris G
comment: Good

author: Marla Braverman
comment: But would like the option to not have the leading zero…

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback Marla.
I'll try and get this feature into an upcoming release :)

title: Love it

author: Matt May
comment: Update: just updated to new version and battery life seems to have increased greatly.... Previous review: Great watch face, but terrible battery drain since Wear 5.0. Please update to new API

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content:
Hey Matt, Thanks for the feedback!

Wear Time Circuit Version 3.0 is now available in the play store and has been fully updated to take advantage of the official Android Wear 5.0 Watch Face API. Battery usage is now significantly improved, as is memory usage and overall performance!

author: Derek Wyman
comment: Way ahead of he curve for Android Wear faces; lI look forward to where it goes once we have the API!  Would like to see another location for Date on the 360; Top doesn't really work and above/below the time clutters the clean look a bit.  Edit:Thanks for the update! Looks smashing right above the sensor cutout ;)

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks Derek, I have just pushed v2.1.2 to the play store that provides a new option that allows you to specify the exact vertical location of the date on the screen. I hope this helps :)

title: Very sharp with tons of customization options

author: Travis Woodall
comment: Very attractive and highly customizable. Only two critiques are 1) small card size and cards that persist after being viewed. 2) customizable font for the date. Other than that it is a clean and good-looking watchface.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Travis! Currently developers don't have control over the cards, but hopefully that'll change when the official google watch face API is released. Look for customizable date fonts in an upcoming release :)

title: I'm digging it!

author: Matt Shockley
comment: So customizable and beautiful. Definitely worth the dollar.   I would love color palette selection for colors (maybe in the phone app). First watch face I've installed with customization actually in the watch interface. This is a nice plus but I wish I could disable it so that I can keep my program list down to the ones I use frequently but I suspect that is not yet a feature of Android Wear.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback Matt! I've actually been thinking about adding a color palette selector to the configuration and will hopefully get that into a future release.

title: My fave for moto360 so far

author: Alex Miramontes
comment: My personal favorite watchface. But here's an idea. How about adding a battery percentage icon that measures the watch's battery life?

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the recommendation. I'll try and get this into an upcoming release.

title: Love it!

author: Ray Henderson
comment: Just the perfect digital face i have been looking for
title: Fantastic

author: Brian Taberski
comment: Love it!

author: Lucas Downton
comment: Love this watch face and its customization options.  This is the first watch face that I've used which can be configured completely through Android Wear.
title: Awesome Watch Face!

author: Eric Barrios
comment: The idea is very good, but IRS hard to make out the time with these colors.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Have you tried the different brightness and color settings in the menu? Some color combinations are better than others. Note that you can also adjust the intensity of the circuit to allow the time to have a greater contrast with the background.

title: Hard to see.

author: Dylan Pollard
comment: I love where this is going!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks Dylan... Please let me know if there are any missing features that would make this a 5 star app for you :)

title: Very smooth

author: Andrew Hoang
comment: Not bad!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content:
Hi Andrew,

Thanks for your purchase!

I have reported your download issue to Google and they responded: "Advise your buyer to contact the Google Wallet Buyer Support team, for them to be directed to the Play Apps team. The problem is not on your console, but is on the Google Play store."

author: Richard Daw
comment: Looks great and is so easy to customise, other watch face developers could learn from this!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks Richard! :)

title: Excellent

author: darktiny he
comment: It was huge than normal watvh face

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Wear Time Circuit Version 3.0 is now available in the play store and has been fully updated to take advantage of the official Android Wear 5.0 Watch Face API. Card size is now reduced, battery usage is now significantly improved, as is memory usage and overall performance!

title: Why the watch face will affect Cards's Text Size?

author: GreekManX
comment: Great app! Fast responding Dev! Just add battery % and weather option like weather watchface and will best one out there and way to remove Ok Google text if possible

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback Niko... the battery icon shows when charging and the weather displayed in the screenshot was the standard 'google now' weather card in ambient mode. Since you are not the first to be confused by this, I have gone ahead and updated the screenshot. 

Thanks again for the suggestions.. I'll look into adding these enhancements.

title: Great app

author: Michael Bourgoin
comment: Really a well done app. Thank you for addressing the clock location. The ability to move the clock was necessary until the api is out, and you did a great job addressing that. Dev was very fast to add this fix. Looks great and works well. Worth the buy. Great job.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Michael. Check out the new feature that I've added to v2.0.6 just for you :)

title: Very nice watch face.

author: Jared Busch
comment: Love the marriage between simplicity and tech. Its a hard balance to achieve creatively. Good job.  No problem ;) Great watch face!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks Jared :)

title: Sexy and simple

author: Nick Tsiotinos
comment: This has become my daily driver. One of the few watchfaces that actually looks better than the promotional pictures. Well done.
title: Elegant and intricate!

author: Zachary Wise
comment: Love it! Hopefully when official support is out for custom watch faces, we can make that first card a little smaller. Edit: update is even better!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: I agree Zachary, I'm planning on setting the notification card size to small as soon as the official wear SDK provides that option to watch faces.

title: Fantastic

author: Nahuel Oviedo
comment: ...It would be great if the google now card could be smaller. After dev´s response, 5 stars!

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Nahuel... I plan on fixing this as soon as Google offers an official watch API that supports styling of the notification cards.

title: Nice face, but...

author: Blake Bryant
comment: I saw this watch face get posted to an android wear community on google+. Immediately liked how it looked but was disappointed there was no 12 hour version. Wrote to the Dev on his post where he announced the watch face and he was able to have an updated version of the watch face with 12 hour support on the play store with in 6 hours of my request. Great Dev can't wait to see what he adds next.

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback Blake.... more features coming soon :)

title: Great watch face and very responsive Dev.

author: Andy Kennedy
comment: Shame can't see the digits clearly though

reply.author: Nitrous Digital
reply.content: Thanks for the valuable feedback Andy... This should now be fixed in the V2 release.

title: Nice design
